summary: Legal/advocate website with legal disclaimer at the bottom and a promotional banner on the front page for fast legal notice services.

existing_features.title: Replace the existing LegalNoticeBanner (dismissible top banner with full disclaimer text) with a condensed legal disclaimer line placed at the very bottom of the page, inside or just above the Footer component in Layout.tsx. The shortened text should read: 'The information on this site is for general informational purposes only and does not constitute legal advice. No attorney-client relationship is formed. As per Bar Council of India rules, advocates are not permitted to solicit work or advertise.'

Add a prominent promotional banner on the HomePage (frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx) that displays the text: 'Send a Legal Notice / Reply to a Legal Notice under 24 hours'. This banner should appear near the top of the homepage content (e.g., just below the hero section or as part of it) and use a visually distinct, attention-grabbing style consistent with the site's existing theme.

new_feature_requests.summary: Shorten legal disclaimer text and move it to the bottom of the page
Add a front page banner: 'Send a Legal Notice / Reply to a Legal Notice under 24 hours'
